snippet.title: Q: Python and “re”
snippet.description: A tutorial I have on Regex in python explains how to use the re module in python, I wanted to grab the URL out of an A tag so knowing Regex I wrote the correct expression and tested it in my regex … testing app of choice and ensured it worked. When placed into python it failed. After much head scratching I found out the issue, it automatically expects your pattern to be at the start of the string …

snippet.title: Q: *Help* Learn Python Tutorial Modules and Packages
snippet.description: I'm stuck in an exercise on learnpython.org referring to Modules and Packages. snippet.title: Q: scrapy python re statement
